verses.roman:
āmāra ālaye aho-rātra-saṅkīrtana
tāhāte āilā teṅho pāñā nimantraṇa

synonyms: āmāra ālaye—at my house; ahaḥ-rātra—day and night; saṅkīrtana—chanting the Hare Kṛṣṇa mantra; tāhāte—on account of this; āilā—came; teṅho—he; pāñā nimantraṇa—getting an invitation.
translation: At my house there was saṅkīrtana day and night, and therefore he visited there, having been invited.
